q: But Steve- who'll be live on the red carpet at this weekend's Baftas for the E! Entertainment channel- stayed tight-lipped about whether he was set to join Simon Cowell for the Stateside show. I've spoken to numerous people and all I'll say about it is it's a job I really, really want and I'd love to do. I don't want to go in depth all about it because I think that's a foolish thing to do. It's just a thing I want to do and we'll see in time, he said.:: Steve Jones will host Live From The Red Carpet: The 2011 Baftas on Sunday at 5pm on E! Entertainment Television.
